description: Dual paths of electrical fury (Tempest) and wind control (Gale).

abilities.name: Static Charge
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, your next weapon hit this turn deals an additional 1d6 lightning damage.

abilities.name: Lightning Bolt
abilities.effect: Fire a bolt of lightning, dealing 1d8 lightning damage. This ability has a lower DC.

abilities.name: Charged Shot
abilities.effect: Enhances Lightning Bolt. Take a -2 penalty to the check. If it hits, the target has disadvantage on its next action.

abilities.name: Thunder Clap
abilities.effect: You clap your hands, creating a thunderous boom. All enemies in a 10-foot cone take 1d6 sonic damage and must make a Might DC 12 check or be 'Deafened' for 1 round.

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.effect: A bolt hits a target for 1d6 lightning damage, then jumps to a second target.

abilities.name: Overcharge
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, you can overcharge a weapon you are holding. The weapon deals an additional 1d4 lightning damage on its next hit.

abilities.name: Thunder Strike
abilities.effect: Hit a target for 1d10 lightning damage, and adjacent foes take 1d10 splash lightning damage.

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.effect: A bolt hits a target for 1d8 lightning damage, then jumps to a second target.

abilities.name: Storm Cloud
abilities.effect: You conjure a small storm cloud over a target. At the start of the target's next turn, they take 2d8 lightning damage. This costs 5 Resolve.
abilities.duration: Until the start of your next turn

abilities.name: Electric Fissure
abilities.effect: You create a line of crackling lightning on the ground in a 20-foot line. Any enemy who enters the line or starts their turn there takes 2d6 lightning damage. This lasts for 3 rounds.

abilities.name: Ride the Lightning
abilities.effect: Enhances Chain Lightning. After you cast it, you can teleport to the location of the last target struck.

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
abilities.effect: Summon a sphere of lightning that zaps the nearest enemy for 3d8 lightning damage at the end of your turn for 3 rounds.

abilities.name: Lightning Arc
abilities.effect: You can unleash a powerful arc of lightning that deals 4d8 lightning damage to a single target and all enemies within 5 feet of it. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Electrical Conduit
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, you can designate a creature as a conduit. All lightning damage dealt to that creature for the next 3 rounds is increased by 1d6. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Ride the Lightning (Expert)
abilities.effect: You can now teleport to the location of the last target struck by your Chain Lightning as a bonus action, even if the ability was used by another character.

abilities.name: Eye of the Storm
abilities.effect: Create a 30-foot radius storm that moves with you. As a bonus action, call a lightning bolt on any target within the storm for 4d10 damage.

abilities.name: Tempest Barrage
abilities.effect: As a major action, you can unleash a flurry of lightning-infused attacks on a single target, dealing 5d8 lightning damage. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Call the Storm
abilities.effect: You can call a massive lightning bolt to strike a single target, dealing 6d10 lightning damage. The target must also make a Mind DC 16 check or be Stunned for 1 round. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Maelstrom
abilities.effect: Deals 6d12 lightning damage to all enemies in a 60-foot radius and 'Deafens' them for 1 minute. Usable once per day.

abilities.name: Tempest's Wrath
abilities.effect: For 1 minute, you are surrounded by a constant storm. All of your lightning attacks deal an additional 2d8 damage, and all enemies who start their turn within 10 feet of you take 3d8 lightning damage. This can only be used once per day and costs 20 Resolve.

abilities.name: Gale Push
abilities.effect: Push all enemies in a 15-foot cone 10 feet away.

abilities.name: Updraft
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, your jump height and distance are tripled for your turn.

abilities.name: Feather Fall
abilities.effect: As a Reaction when you or an ally are falling, negate the falling damage.

abilities.name: Wind's Favor
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, you grant yourself a gust of wind, increasing your movement speed by 15 feet for your current turn.

abilities.name: Gale Shield
abilities.effect: You create a shield of wind around an ally, granting them a +2 bonus to their defense for one round. This costs 1 Resolve.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, grant an ally within 10 feet a gust of wind, increasing their movement speed by 10 feet for their turn.

abilities.name: Cyclone
abilities.effect: Create a 15-foot radius cyclone. The area is difficult terrain and ranged attacks through it have a -2 penalty.

abilities.name: Redirect
abilities.effect: Enhances Gale Push. You can now choose a different direction for each target to be pushed.

abilities.name: Gust of Wind
abilities.effect: You can release a strong gust of wind in a 30-foot line. Enemies in the line must make a Might DC 13 check or be pushed back 15 feet. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Wind-Splitter Shot
abilities.effect: When you make a ranged attack, you can channel the wind to add an extra 1d6 physical damage to your attack roll. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Ride the Current
abilities.effect: Move yourself and up to two allies up to 30 feet in a straight line without provoking Attacks of Opportunity. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Storm Flight
abilities.effect: You gain the ability to fly for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Wall of Wind
abilities.effect: Create a 30-foot long, 10-foot high wall of wind. The wall provides cover and a -4 penalty to ranged attacks that pass through it. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Redirecting Winds
abilities.effect: As a reaction, when a ranged attack is made against an ally within 30 feet, you can use this ability to force a new attack roll with a -2 penalty against a different enemy within 15 feet of the original target. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Unwavering Winds
abilities.effect: You create a 20-foot aura around you. Any enemy who enters or starts their turn in the aura is immune to being moved. This lasts for 3 rounds. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Hurricane
abilities.effect: Summon a 40-foot radius hurricane. Enemies are pushed 20 feet from the center, and moving toward the center costs triple movement.

abilities.name: Eye of the Storm (Gale)
abilities.effect: You create a 30-foot radius storm that moves with you. The storm is heavily obscured. You can see and attack normally within the storm. Enemies within the storm have disadvantage on attack rolls. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Perfected Flight
abilities.effect: Enhances Storm Flight. Your flight speed is increased to 90 feet and you gain a +2 bonus to all Agility checks while flying.

abilities.name: Tornado
abilities.effect: Summon a mobile tornado for 3 rounds. Creatures it moves through must make a Might DC 18 check or be thrown 40 feet and take 5d10 bludgeoning damage.

abilities.name: Ultimate Hurricane
abilities.effect: You summon a massive hurricane that fills a 60-foot radius. Any enemy who starts their turn in the hurricane must make a Might DC 18 check or be picked up, thrown 60 feet, and take 8d10 bludgeoning damage. This lasts for 3 rounds. This can only be used once per day and costs 20 Resolve.
